applications.name: Dropbox
applications.description: Dropbox is a cloud storage service for storing, syncing, and sharing files across devices. The web interface includes keyboard navigation for managing files and folders with screen reader support for accessible file management.

shortcuts.description: Press Question Mark to display list of all available keyboard shortcuts in Dropbox.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce shortcuts help dialog opened. View all shortcuts organized by category.

shortcuts.description: Press G then H to navigate to Dropbox home view showing recent files and folders.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Home view opened. Shows recently accessed files.

shortcuts.description: Press G then F to navigate to Files view showing all your Dropbox files and folders.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Files view opened with folder tree and file list.

shortcuts.description: Press G then S to navigate to Shared view showing files and folders shared with you.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Shared view opened. Shows items others have shared with you.

shortcuts.description: Press G then D to navigate to Deleted Files view showing recently deleted items.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce Deleted Files view. Files can be restored within 30 days.

shortcuts.description: Press Forward Slash to place focus in search box for searching files and folders.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce search box focused. Type filename or content to search.

shortcuts.description: Press Up or Down Arrow to navigate through files and folders in the list.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce each file name, type, size, and modified date as you navigate.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Enter to open selected file for preview or navigate into selected folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file opening or folder contents loading.

shortcuts.description: Press Backspace to navigate up one level to parent folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce parent folder name and contents.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is focused
shortcuts.description: Press X to select or deselect focused file or folder without moving focus.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file selected or deselected. Build multi-selection for batch operations.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and A together to select all files and folders in current view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce all files selected with count.

shortcuts.description: Press Escape to clear all file selections.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce selection cleared.

shortcuts.description: Press Shift and N together to create a new folder in current location.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce new folder dialog. Type folder name and press Enter.

shortcuts.description: Press U to open file upload dialog for uploading files from your computer to Dropbox.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce upload dialog. Select files to upload to current folder.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press D to download selected file or folder to your computer.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce download started. File saves to default downloads folder.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press R to rename selected file or folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce rename dialog. Type new name and press Enter to save.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press V to move selected items to a different folder location.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce move dialog. Navigate folders and select destination.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press C to copy selected items to a different folder while keeping originals.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce copy dialog. Choose destination folder for copies.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Backspace or Delete to move selected items to deleted files folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce confirmation dialog. Items can be restored within 30 days.

shortcuts.description: Press Shift and Delete together to permanently delete items from deleted files folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce permanent deletion warning. Cannot be recovered after deletion.

shortcuts.description: Press R to restore selected deleted file to its original location.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file restored. Returns to location before deletion.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press S to open sharing dialog for selected file or folder to share with others.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce share dialog. Add email addresses and set permissions.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press L to copy shareable link for selected file or folder to clipboard.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce link copied to clipboard. Paste link to share with others.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press I to show details panel with file information, sharing, and activity.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce details panel opened. View size, modified date, and sharing info.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press 1 to star or unstar selected file for quick access from starred section.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file starred or unstarred. Starred files easily accessible.

shortcuts.description: Press T to toggle between list view and grid/thumbnail view for files.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce view changed to list or grid. List view more accessible for screen readers.

shortcuts.description: Press O to open sort options menu for changing file sort order.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce sort menu. Sort by name, date modified, size, or type.

shortcuts.context: When preview or dialog is open
shortcuts.description: Press Escape to close file preview, dialog, or panel and return to file list.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce preview or dialog closed. Returns focus to file list.

shortcuts.context: When Dropbox desktop app is running
shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and D together to open local Dropbox folder in file explorer.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce File Explorer opening Dropbox folder. Works with desktop sync app.

shortcuts.context: When Dropbox desktop app has focus
shortcuts.description: Press Control and Comma together to open Dropbox preferences or settings.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce preferences dialog. Configure sync, notifications, and account settings.
